sentences.en: Bland, banal music tinkled discreetly from hidden loudspeakers.
sentences.cn: 隐藏的喇叭里幽幽地传出平淡乏味的音乐。

sentences.en: Connie gave him a bland look. " What show? "
sentences.cn: 康妮爱理不理地瞅了他一眼, “ 管什么事? ”

sentences.en: For a day or two Mr. Sympson continued as bland as oil.
sentences.cn: 辛普森先生有一两天工夫仍是和蔼得象油一般.

sentences.en: He came forward with such a bland, engaging smile.
sentences.cn: 他带着一副殷勤的 、 动人的笑容,走向前来.
他和颜悦色地厚着脸皮把一切都赖掉了.

sentences.en: He eats bland food because of his stomach trouble.
sentences.cn: 他因胃病而吃清淡的食物.

sentences.en: He eats only bland food because of his ulcer.
sentences.cn: 他患溃疡,只能吃无刺激性的食物.

sentences.en: It sounds like an advert: easy on the ear but bland and forgettable.
sentences.cn: 这听起来像广告词：听着简单易懂，但是枯燥乏味，容易忘记。

sentences.en: It tasted bland and insipid, like warmed cardboard.
sentences.cn: 这吃起来淡而无味，像加热过的纸板。

sentences.en: It tasted indescribably bland and insipid, like warmed cardboard.
sentences.cn: 这东西尝起来淡而无味至极，像加热过的纸板一样。
特德不温不火的样子能把人气疯.

sentences.en: That oatmeal is so bland that it is tasteless.
The music sounds like an advert—easy on the ear but bland and forgettable.
sentences.cn: 这音乐听起来像是广告——悦耳但是毫无特点，听过就忘。

sentences.en: This soup is too bland for me.
To make the bland taste more interesting, the locals began perking it up with local produce.
sentences.cn: 为了使这淡而无味的东西更有味道，当地人开始加些土特产调味。

trans.tran_cn: 温和的，和蔼的，平和的，味道温和的，无动于衷的
trans.tran_en: without any excitement, strong opinions, or special character

trans.tran_cn: 变得平淡无奇；丧失特性
使…变得淡而无味；除掉…的特性
